Sentencas: La0.7Sr0.3MnO3, a good candidate material for a cathode of solid oxide fuel cells, was synthesized by gel combustion method to obtain fine gain size and good sinterability.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: Powders with the perovskite structure, rather than the amorphous one, were directly obtained after self-propagating combustion of dried gels.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: The influences of pH and content of citric acid on the stability of the sol system, the combustion process and the phase formation were focused on by this study.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: The contributions of La3+, Sr2+ and Mn2+ and metal complexes at different pH values were calculated to determine the suitable pH value for the sol system.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: It was found from experiments that the sol was stable and clear at pH below 3, while white precipitates appeared at pH above 3.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: The combustion extent was improved with increasing pH and with decreasing the content of citric acid.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: Almost single phase of perovskite was found at low ratio of citric acid to nitrates (denote this ratio as phi).
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: However a small amount of second phase occurred with increasing phi to above 1.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: A rational density of the sample prepared via high phi value (1.5) was obtained after sintering at 1300 degrees C for 2 h. The electrical conductivity of samples was measured by a DC four-probe method.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: It was demonstrated that conductivity enhanced with increasing phi.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: The maximum conductivity was 150 S/cm for the above-mentioned sample.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion

Sentencas: It was revealed that the optimal phi was 1.5 when considering both phase formation and sinterability of the powder.
Titulo: Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion
Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion
Synthesis and properties of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 cathode by gel combustion
